title: observation
description:
A document describing the observation of one or more items, by a particular observer using a specified method. In epistemic terms, the submission of this document is an attestation that the items are as described, and the reliability of this attestation is a function of various factors.

The `observer`, `method`, and `items` properties are all required for the observation document to be valid.

platform.description: The mounting point of the sensory system used to collect the observation

identity.description: The relationship of the submitter of this observation to the data collection

location.description: A point on Earth defined by latitude and longitude

anyOf.title: conveyance
anyOf.description: A means of transporting materials, either matter or energy, from one location to another

location.description: The location where the facility is situated or installed
location.title: GeoJSON Feature

capabilities.description: A list of the facility's capabilities to transform inputs into outputs

throughputs.description: A list of the rates at which the facility can process various items

anyOf.title: Reservoir
anyOf.description: A physical container that can hold a quantity of one or more materials, as installed at a location and intended for one or more uses. Reservoirs can store matter, energy, or both

location.description: The location where the reservoir is situated or installed
location.title: GeoJSON Feature

attributes.description: The qualities of the container that are directly relevant to its economic value

capacity.description: The material or energy capacity of the reservoir

purpose.description: How this reservoir is used, which will depend on its role in the larger facility or system

usages.description: The role(s) this reservoir plays in production processes

materials.description: The substances or materials that this reservoir typically contains during its use

platform.description: The mounting point of the sensory system used to collect the observation

identity.description: The relationship of the submitter of this observation to the data collection
